description.ko: 수백만 년의 지질학적 역사를 보여주는 갈라진 토양, 화산 파편, 그리고 풍부한 광물 퇴적물이 뒤섞인 지구 표면의 세밀한 탐구입니다.
description.en: A detailed exploration of the Earth's surface, featuring a mix of parched soil, volcanic fragments, and rich mineral deposits showcasing millions of years of geological history.

prompt: High-resolution macro photography of cracked dry earth and volcanic rock, intricate mineral veins in gold and obsidian, hyper-realistic textures, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, top-down perspective, organic patterns of erosion and sediment, tactile surface details.
